ruleset.name: AppExchange Security Review v.3.20
ruleset.description: Custom XPath Rules provided as special Security Scanner engine 'pmd-appexchange' from v.3.20 Decompiled with https://jdec.app/ from Java libs from https://github.com/forcedotcom/sfdx-scanner/tree/dev/pmd-appexchange/lib

rule.name: AvoidUnsafeSystemSetPassword
rule.message: Before calling System.setPassword() in Apex, perform necessary authorization checks.
rule.description: Detects where System.setPassword() exists in Apex code. Use this method with caution.

rule.name: AvoidCallingSystemResetPasswordWithEmailTemplate
rule.message: Before calling System.resetPasswordWithEmailTemplate(), perform the necessary authorization checks.
rule.description: Detects where System.resetPasswordWithEmailTemplate() exists in Apex code. Use this method with caution.

rule.name: AvoidUnsafeSystemMovePassword
rule.message: Before calling System.movePassword(), perform the necessary authorization checks.
rule.description: Detects where System.movePassword() is used in Apex code. Use this method with caution.

rule.name: AvoidChangeProtectionUnprotected
rule.message: Update your code to avoid using FeatureManagement.changeProtection called by an UnProtected argument.
rule.description: Detects potential misuse of FeatureManagement.changeProtection.

rule.name: AvoidUnauthorizedGetSessionIdInApex
rule.message: Use of UserInfo.getSessionId might not be authorized.
rule.description: Detects use of UserInfo.getSessionId() to retrieve a session ID.

rule.name: AvoidUnsafeSystemResetPassword
rule.message: Before calling System.resetPassword(), perform the necessary authorization checks.
rule.description: Detects where System.resetPassword() exists in Apex code. Use this method with caution.

rule.name: AvoidWithoutSharingInRestApiController
rule.message: Use "with sharing" in Apex classes with the @RestResource annotation.
rule.description: Detects use of "without sharing" in an Apex class exposed with the @RestResource annotation.

property.name: xpath
property.value: if (./ModifierNode/Annotation[@Image = "RestResource"]) then ./ModifierNode[@WithSharing = false() and @InheritedSharing = false()] else false

rule.name: AvoidHardcodedCredentials
rule.message: Remove hard-coded credentials from source code.
rule.description: Identifies hard-coded credentials in source code that must be protected using Protected Custom metadata or Protected Custom settings.

rule.name: AvoidLwcBubblesComposedTrue
rule.message: Avoid setting both Lightning Web component bubbles and composed=true at the same time.
rule.description: Detects Lightning Web Component event configurations where bubbles and composed are both set to true. To avoid sharing sensitive information unintentionally, use this configuration with caution.

rule.name: UseLwcDomManual
rule.message: Protect against XSS when using lwc:dom="manual".
rule.description: Detects instances of lwc:dom="manual" that could allow unintentional or malicious user input. Don't allow user input on these elements.
rule.example: & If template has a direct user input. Then XSS is possible.

rule.name: AvoidLmcIsExposedTrue
rule.message: Use Lightning Message Channel with isExposed set to false.
rule.description: Detects a Lightning Message Channel with isExposed=true, which isnâ€™t allowed in managed packages.

rule.name: AvoidApiSessionId
rule.message: Session ID use is not approved.
rule.description: Detects use of Api.Session_ID to retrieve a session ID.

rule.name: UpgradeLwcLockerSecuritySupport
rule.message: To enable Lightning Locker, update the API version to version 40 or greater.
rule.description: Detects use of API versions with Lightning Locker disabled. Use API version 40 or greater.

rule.name: AvoidUnauthorizedApiSessionIdInFlows
rule.message: $Api.Session_ID usage is not approved.
rule.description: Detects use of session ID in SOAP API calls in flows.

rule.name: UseHttpsCallbackUrl
rule.message: Update to secure Oauth callback URL over HTTPS.
rule.description: Detects instances of an OAuth callback URL that uses HTTP. Use HTTPS instead.

rule.name: AvoidJsLinksInCustomObject
rule.message: Avoid clickable JavaScript-style URLs.
rule.description: Detects instances of JavaScript-style URLs (javascript:) in Salesforce DOM components, such as web links and buttons. Avoid JavaScript-style URLs in managed packages.

rule.name: AvoidJavaScriptWeblink
rule.message: Avoid using JavaScript in web links.
rule.description: Detects use of custom JavaScript actions in web links.

rule.name: LimitConnectedAppScope
rule.message: Update the connected app request to limited scope instead of full scope.
rule.description: Detects if a connected app uses full scope. Explain this use case in your AppExchange security review submission.

rule.name: AvoidSystemModeInFlows
rule.message: Reconfigure to avoid running flows in system mode.
rule.description: Detects where default mode must be used in flows instead of system mode.

rule.name: AvoidJavaScriptHomePageComponent
rule.message: Avoid JavaScript in a home page component body.
rule.description: Detects use of custom JavaScript actions in home page components.

rule.name: ProtectSensitiveData
rule.message: To store secrets, use Protected Custom settings or Protected Custom metadata.
rule.description: Detects where sensitive data must be stored with Protected Custom metadata or Protected Custom settings.

property.name: xpath
property.value: ( //CustomObject/visibility/text[@Image="Public"] /ancestor::CustomObject/customSettingsType/ancestor::CustomObject/fields/fullName/text [contains(upper-case(@Image), "KEY") or contains(upper-case(@Image),"ACCESSKEY") or contains(upper-case(@Image),"PASS") or contains(upper-case(@Image),"PASSWORD") or contains(upper-case(@Image),"ENCRYPT") or contains(upper-case(@Image),"TOKEN") or contains(upper-case(@Image),"SECRET") or contains(upper-case(@Image),"HASH")] ) | ( //CustomObject/visibility/text[@Image="Public"] /ancestor::CustomObject/fields/fullName/text [contains(upper-case(@Image),"KEY") or contains(upper-case(@Image),"ACCESSKEY") or contains(upper-case(@Image),"PASS") or contains(upper-case(@Image),"PASSWORD") or contains(upper-case(@Image),"ENCRYPT") or contains(upper-case(@Image),"TOKEN") or contains(upper-case(@Image),"SECRET") or contains(upper-case(@Image),"HASH")] )
